sentence: We complained and maintenance changed the filter and alleviated most of the noise
If you prefer modern features higher ceilings updated interiors a big lobby area or an impressive entrance you should consider looking at other options for this price category

But on our last stay the worn out beige color palette of all the rooms and the empty space in most of them as if there was a furniture shortage could not help seem lack luster in comparison to the brighter more updated hotel rooms elsewhere
and I really think the RC should be in line for a renovation
They were remodeling rooms above so the noice was uncomfortable
Mariot is clearly updated the Ritz line of hotels and sinking money into them
It was well appointed but in need of refreshing as the bedskirt and wall fabric had some stains
I think it is the quietest hotel in NYC Hotel is in need of a refresh
Last night issue with the AC did not work well below 70 next day repaired men in the hallway
The rooms can use a little updating
This is in addition to the beautifully renovated rooms that have to be some of the most spacious in NYC
The newly renovated rooms are exceptional and a delight regardless of your budget deluxe or super deluxe
This last stay we received a newly renovated room
LaPrairie spa re opened after completing a beautiful remodel and has several services to choose from
But once again the staff were phenomenal room service was great cleanliness and facility upkeep was great and you ca n’t beat the location
Immaculate recently renovated bathroom

The remodel of the hotel is spectacular and this will be our go to location from now on when we visit New York
